name: Crossrain
description:
Enter the  dungeon and fight your way through 100 rooms of threats to escape!

Made for the MFGJ Winter 2023 game jam

Enemies Zombie

The zombie is a slow moving enemy that doesn't pose much of a threat by itself, but can be deadly when you're distracted

Demon

The demon is a slow moving enemy that can't attack you by itself, but instead conjures demonspawn to do its bidding

Demonspawn

The demonspawn are small, fast moving enemies created by the demon that are hard to hit

This is an open source game, all code and assets are here
